briefDescription: Sahyog (an initiative of CHEHAK TRUST) is committed to a community-based model of social change through the education of marginalized women and children in low-income communities in the suburbs of Mumbai.Sahyogâ€™s vision is to create secular, progressive and empowering spaces, which enables women and children to envision a world in which they have the freedom to think, express and make their own choices.Sahyog ProgrammesSangharsh ( 2003) : Creating avenues of learning for children with disabilities by setting up of special school within the communities which do not possess the resources for their development. Networking with Ngo, Government agency, creating support system for parents of children with disabilities, through home visits, parents meeting. Over past 10 years 70 differently able children have benefited from this programme .Jhula ( 2003 ) : A life skills programme for adolescent girls and women which addresses the personal, social,economic and political issues that affect their lives . Jhula curriculum which has been specifically designed for this , has been requested by many Municipal & Private Schools , CBO's . Umang : an 8-month part-time Skill development and Mentorship training programme for young women to equip them with skills for personal and community development to be valuable members of their society . 90 Trainees have graduated from this programme .
